attributes.action: call a general election now to allow the voters throughout the UK to deal with the issue of their MP's expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An immediate general election would force each sitting MP to justify themselves and would give voters in each constituency in the country a say on their sitting MP's financial conduct, in order to restore legitimacy to Parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
